author: andschwa
body: Uh oh! We need to fix this ASAP or all our packages get pushed to rc3, and we switched to rc2 in #862.

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: I can fix this, but I also need to fix our projects to refer to [Microsoft.NETCore](https://dotnet.myget.org/feed/dotnet-core/package/nuget/Microsoft.NETCore) instead of [NETStandard.Library](https://dotnet.myget.org/feed/dotnet-core/package/nuget/NETStandard.Library).

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: Going to take another page from the .NET CLI project and keep using NETStandard.Library, and just fix MMIN.

title: MMIN package built against `NETStandard.Library (>= 1.5.0-rc3-24011-00)`
